name: OpenMetrics endpoint health
description: Returns `CRITICAL` if the Agent is unable to connect to the OpenMetrics endpoint, otherwise returns `OK`.

name: TeamCity build status health
description: Returns `CRITICAL` if the finished build has a status of FAILURE. Returns `OK` otherwise.

name: TeamCity build problem health
description: Returns `CRITICAL` if the finished build has encountered a problem. Returns `OK` otherwise.

name: TeamCity build tests status health
description: Returns `CRITICAL` if the finished build test has encountered a problem, `WARNING` if it has encountered a warning, or `UNKNOWN` if it has encountered an unknown problem. Returns `OK` otherwise.
